message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20,000. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $12,000?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but $12,000 is still a bit lower than I'd like to sell for. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $17,000. This is a compromise I'm willing to make, but I'm not going any lower than that. Let me know if this works for you!
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  How about we settle at $14,000?

Hi Bob, I'm glad you're willing to meet me at $17,000, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $14,000. I'm willing to compromise again, but I think $16,500 is the lowest I can go. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let me know if this works for you!
Alice, we're getting closer.  I'm willing to come up a bit to $14,500.  That's the best I can do.
